summary: Twenty-something mates Francisco, Ignacio, and Dani meet for their Sunday rituals: a paella, a dip in the sea. After spotting an obituary for a schoolmate, they decide to attend the funeral... See full summary »
cast: Javier Pereira|Oriol Vila|Marc Rodríguez|Tamara Arias|Irene Montalà|Núria Gago|Ivan Massagué|Bruno Bergonzini|Bart Santana|Roger Ribó|Àngela Jové|Albert Espinosa|Ronaldinho Gaúcho|Rafael Márquez
title: Tu vida en 65'
